actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution reaffirming the support of the Congress of the United States for the people of Poland.

summary.text: Expresses the support of the Congress for the Solidarity movement in Poland. Deplores the imposition of martial law. Places the ultimate responsibility for martial law on the Soviet Union. Declares that Congress will view the denial by the Polish government of human and civil rights won by Solidarity as evidence of the Soviet Union's contempt for the Helsinki accords. Reaffirms the support of the Congress for the Polish people. Reaffirms its concern over Soviet interference in Polish affairs.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution reaffirming the support of the Congress of the United States for the people of Poland.
